import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient, HttpHeaders } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { loadedPosts = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit() {} onCreatePost(postData: { title: string; content: string }) { // Send Http request this.http.post( 'https://ng-complete-guide-7b384-default-rtdb.asia-southeast1.firebasedatabase.app/posts.json', postData ).subscribe(responseData => { console.log(responseData); }) console.log(postData); } onFetchPosts() { // Send Http request let headers = new HttpHeaders({}); this.http.get( 'http://localhost:8080/api/product/v1', { headers: headers.set('Authorization', 'Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJyb2xlIjpbIkNVU1RPTUVSIl0sInVzZXJOYW1lIjoidGVzdDExMSIsInVzZXJJZCI6IjhmMmYwZTE4LTJmNzItMTFlZS04Nzg2LWM4NWFjZjA2ODk4ZSIsInN1YiI6IjhmMmYwZTE4LTJmNzItMTFlZS04Nzg2LWM4NWFjZjA2ODk4ZSIsImlhdCI6MTY5MDc4ODczNiwiZXhwIjoxNjkxMzkzNTM2fQ.K0Vnj1cWjdMEddn6nyO6m5d_kaHzCcsJW_PgmMc2Jmy9ynpOzZxf3nyEmsVVBqDONfuejzkmljTDFRyM24cJxw') } ).subscribe(responseData => { console.log(responseData); }, error => { console.log(error); }) } onClearPosts() { // Send Http request } onRegister(postData: { userName: string; emailAddress: string; password: string }) { this.http.post( 'http://localhost:8080/api/user/v1/register', postData ).subscribe(responseData => { console.log(responseData); }) console.log(postData); } onLogin(postData: { userName: string; password: string }) { this.http.post( 'http://localhost:8080/api/auth/v1/login', postData ).subscribe(responseData => { console.log(responseData); }) console.log(postData); } }
